ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Finally got on
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah, baulders gate looks pretty cool. mlockridge01  wrote: Got a response from Sony, sent them the info they requested to investigate on
ygData.messageBody:
yeah, baulders gate looks pretty cool.

  mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:

Got a response from Sony, sent them the info they requested to
investigate on their end. Meanwhile, tried again just a bit after
midnight this morning, and went on fine.

I hope that this was just a little problem. Otherwise the conclusion
I might draw is that, for two days at many various times, I could not
get on because the login server was swamped. That bodes ill for all
of us.

I asked Sony to continue the investigation even though the problem
seems to have gone away. I want some assurance that I can get on
whenever I want to play. I had plans for some extended play time on
my days off, and they were frustrated by this problem.

On the up side, I got back to Baldur's Gate for a bit.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Warrior
Zeb Server



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
